mapper.select: select ID, USER_ID, ROLE_ID, STATUS, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE from SYSTEM_USER_ROLE

SELECT a.ID, a.NAME, a.STATUS, a.CREATEDATE, a.UPDATEDATE, a.DESCRIPTION, a.SORT FROM SYSTEM_ROLE a inner JOIN SYSTEM_USER_ROLE ur ON ur.ROLE_ID = a.id and ur.STATUS='1' inner JOIN SYSTEM_USERS u ON u.id = ur.USER_ID AND u.STATUS = '1' and ur.USER_ID = #{userId} WHERE a.STATUS = '1' ORDER BY a.sort
